greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of (n/tau(n) - sigma(n)/n).
link: Michael De Vlieger, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n)/A245777(n) < 1 for numbers n in A245779.
a(n)/A245777(n) is an integer for numbers n in A245778.
example: For n = 9; a(9) = numerator(9/tau(9) - sigma(9)/9) = numerator(9/3 - 13/9) = numerator(14/9) = 14.
program: (PARI) vector(150, n, numerator(n/numdiv(n) - sigma(n)/n)) \\ _Derek Orr_, Aug 01 2014
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Aug 01 2014
